summary: Craft useless items into worth while items
descriptionHtml:
Ok, this is NOT a supreme crafting mod to unbalance things. 
It does NOT break down armor or weapons. 
It does not let you break down a snowberry and create Gerbils to be familiars, or create M16\'s from a copy of the \"Lusty Argonian Maid\". 

What it DOES do is :

Gives you a few options to break down items you normally can\'t even sell, and create minor useful items accordingly. For packrats, this will allow you a lore friendly way to empty out all those crates that have your misc. crap, and shrink your storage list in your save game.

====

Recipees include :

Smelter:
---------

* Create Iron Ingot From:
	Basic Tankard 
	Flagon
	Lantern

* Create Malachite Ingot
	Empty Wine Bottles (10 bottles = 1 ingot)
		(Note: 1 for each type, does not cross over types)

* Create Firewood :
	Wooden Bowls
	Wooden Plates
	Broom
	Buckets
	Wooden Ladle

=====

Tanning Rack:
--------------

* Create Roll of Paper :
	Burnt book
	Ruined Book
	Baskets (all 6 basic ones)


(Note: Yes, I chose this crafting table specificly because you have to dry the paper in sheet form, and it best matches the tanning rack, not the forge.)

=====

Cooking Pot :
--------------

*Create Bonemeal out of :

	Human skull
	Troll Skull


=====

Forge :
--------

* Create Lockpick : 6 per 1 Iron Ingot



=====

I MIGHT make more things to take care of the crap drawer for packrats, but I have tried to keep things mostly basic, and fairly realistic. We will see how things go with this, however. I made this for myself, and figured others might like to have a simple, basic utility to use the common unsellable items the game allows you to gather.

I MIGHT add some rare armors or the like later on, but we will have to see about that, depending on my interest and time.
author: Pan Dragondagger --- aka -  Rex1029
